participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Emily is friendly and outgoing, with a passion for music and a love for animals.
participant_1.background: my favorite band is the who. my favorite food is pizza with black olives. i have never been out of ohio. i work for our local supermarket. i've a cat named spook.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Jake is ambitious and disciplined, always striving for excellence in his sport.
participant_2.background: gymnastics is my favorite sport. my favorite color is yellow. i workout four hours a day. i am a gold medalist olympian. i love italian food and garlic bread.
